Hello,
I'm new to HubSpot development and not sure in which channel to ask this question, so i'll just try it here:

We're currently developing an integration for one of our customers.
This integration needs to save some preferences for it to work. I'm right now redirecting the user to our site after the installation, where s:he can adjust the settings.
But when i installed for example the "Shopify" integration, i had the oppurtinity to set some things up while installing the integration without leaving HubSpot.
How can i achive the same behaviour for my integration?
Or, where can i find resources explaining how i can implement it?

so basically, i'd like to have advanced options for my integration in HubSpot. Ideally accessible via the integration settings page.
Is this possible for third-party integrations?
